creator: martin.grebac@sun.com
text:
We'd like to add possibility of stepping (in debugger) through tag files, but
realized there's no mapping info in between the tag files and the generated java
code - the only mentioned file in the smap mapping is the jsp itself. I think
the files should be mapped similar to mappings of static/dynamic includes. Or is
another stratum needed here?

You can't file a bug against Tomcat 5.0.30 -- it hasn't been released yet ;)  
I'll change that to 5.0.29.

Secondly, when you ask for an enhancement and are unclear or ambiguous yourself 
about what should be done, Bugzilla is not the right place.  Use the mailing 
lists for discussion and ideas.  When you have a specific proposal, preferably 
with specific .diff patches, only then should you open a Bugzilla item.  Thank 
you.
creator: yoavs@computer.org
